product.name: 6PCS Premium White Hydrangea Artificial Flowers Bouquets, Ivory Silk Hydrangea Flowers Heads with Stems, Fake Hydrangeas Flowers Arrangement, Faux Hydrangea Decor for Home Wedding Party Baby Shower
product.description:
Our artificial full hydrangea flowers are like real flowers and can be used repeatedly. These fake hydrangeas can be bundled together for a fuller appearance. You can create beautiful floral arrangements, bouquets, or centerpieces.
You will get 6pcs artificial hydrangea flower heads with stems, Our full silk hydrangea flowers have 96 petals for each flower head. The large fake hydrangea head diameter is about 6 inches, and the height is about 3 inches. The individual stem length is about 10 inches.
Our Lifelike faux flowers are used for home decor, table decor, office decor, room decor, wedding bridal bouquets, and centerpiece table decorations. Our DIY flower arrangement is a great gift for Thanksgiving, Birthdays, Mother's Day, Parties, and baby showers.
Feature a unique hydrangea flower arrangements crafted from premium silk and flexible iron wire materials. Its vivid colors and clear texture make for a realistic appearance that lasts and is real to the touch! It's odorless and provides beauty without maintenance, suitable for people who like flowers but are allergic to them.
product.bullet_points:
• Lifelike & Elegant Decor - Our artificial full hydrangea flowers are like real flowers and can be used repeatedly. These fake hydrangeas can be bundled together for a fuller appearance. You can create beautiful floral arrangements, bouquets, or centerpieces. They bring beauty and great mood to your day, and are a great addition to your daily displays.
• Realistic High-Quality Materials - Our faux hydrangea flowers are handmade with high-quality silk fabric by skilled craftsmen, so These faux hydrangea Heads are realistic, persistent, and reusable. The long stems are made of plastic with iron wire, allowing for flexibility in bending or cutting to suit your DIY bouquet preferences.
• Flower Size - Our full silk hydrangea flowers have 96 petals for each flower head. The large fake hydrangea head diameter is about 6 inches, and the height is about 3 inches. The individual stem length is about 14.5 inches.
• Value Package - You will get 6pcs artificial hydrangea flower heads with stems, without any vase. Due to transportation, hydrangea artificial flowers may be deformed. You can use a hair dryer to blow hot air to make the flowers full, so that your decoration will be more beautiful.
• Perfect for Most Occasions - Our silk hydrangea flowers with stems are perfect for making bouquets, boutonnieres, arch decorations, wreaths, cake flowers, or any other flower decorations. These silk hydrangea flowers are also great for various occasions like weddings, parties, baby showers, bridal showers, graduation, festivals, homes, gardens, churches, offices, hotels, cafes, shops, table centerpieces, gardens, DIY bouquets, etc.
